description: Giant Hyssop (Agastache 'Blue Fortune') is a stunning and unique flowering plant. This perennial sports deep violet-blue blooms which contrast magnificently with its tall, green foliage. Its sweetly scented, nectar-rich flowers draw in a wide variety of pollinators, providing a source of vital nourishment as well as spectacularly vivid garden displays. Its highly drought tolerant and will thrive in full sun locations with well-draining soil. Even better, it's incredibly easy to manage and care for, making it an ideal choice for first-time gardeners!
